comment: Sabar mela. Aku faham tu, in shaa Allah ramai dah dpt vaccine now. Just make sure diaorg jaga diri diaorg bila keluar tu.
amr:
# ::snt Sabar mela. Aku faham tu, in shaa Allah ramai dah dpt vaccine now. Just make sure diaorg jaga diri diaorg bila keluar tu.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Sabar"
                  :op2 "Mela"))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (h / have-polarity-91
                  :ARG2 -
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Allah")))
            :op2 h
            :ARG1 (v / vaccine)
            :ARG2 -
            :location (s / shaa))
      :op3 h
      :ARG1 v
      :ARG2 -
      :time (n3 / now)
      :snt3 (e / ensure-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 a
            :op1 (j / jaga
                  :mode expressive)
            :op2 (d / diri
                  :mode expressive)
            :op3 (b / bila
                  :mode expressive)
            :op4 (k / keluar
                  :mode expressive))
      :mod (j2 / just))
